pkgmetadata.longdescription: Companion to Applied Linear Statistical Models // Functions and Data set presented in Applied Linear Statistical Models Fifth Edition (Chapters 1-9 and 16-21), Michael H. Kutner; Christopher J. Nachtsheim; John Neter; William Li, 2005. (ISBN-10: 0071122214, ISBN-13: 978-0071122214) that do not exist in R, are gathered in this package. The whole book will be covered in the next versions.
